title: Roasted vegetable lasagne
description: Young, old and in-betweens will love this vegetarian Italian-style dish.
ingredientLines: 8 tbsp olive oil plus a little for greasing

title: Broccoli, spinach and parmesan pies
description: This vegetarian broccoli, spinach and parmesan pie recipe makes a meal for 2 people that's ready in 45 minutes.
ingredientLines: 50g pack Tesco grated parmesan (or vegetarian alternative)
500g pack Tesco Finest Cornish Butter Mash

title: Satay noodles
description: If you love peanut butter then Katy Beskow's noodle recipe is the meal for you. Fresh, light, spicy and full of crunch – this quick and easy dish is ready to eat in just a quarter of an hour.
ingredientLines: Small handful sugar snap peas, halved
2 spring onions, sliced on the diagonal
2 x 150g packs soft egg-free ready-to-wok noodles
2 tsp sesame seeds, small handful fresh coriander, 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely sliced, and roughly chopped peanuts to garnish
